snippet: Thousands of nationalists rallied across Russia on Monday in a sign of the growing strength of far-right political forces galvanized by an anti-immigrant agenda.
abstract: Thousands of nationalists rally across Russia for National Unity Day, holiday that commemorates the 1612 liberation of Moscow from Polish invaders, in a sign of the growing strength of far-right political forces galvanized by an anti-immigrant agenda.
lead_paragraph: Thousands of nationalists rallied across Russia on Monday in a sign of the growing strength of far-right political forces galvanized by an anti-immigrant agenda.
